meta.description: FogSift Problem Queue - Submissions waiting to be worked on
meta.note: MOCK DATA - These are example submissions to show the format. Real submissions will appear here once we go live.

queue.problem_summary: SaaS onboarding flow has 60% drop-off rate
Can't figure out why my podcast isn't growing despite consistent uploads
Inventory system is a mess - spreadsheets everywhere, no single source of truth

completed.problem_summary: Team communication is scattered across Slack, email, and texts
completed.outcome_text: Found 3 quick wins and a deeper workflow issue worth exploring

completed.problem_summary: Pricing my freelance services - always undercharging
completed.outcome_text: Built a simple pricing calculator framework she can use

completed.problem_summary: Website loads slowly but host says it's fine
completed.outcome_text: Identified the issue (unoptimized images + bad caching) and referred to a specialist

completed.problem_summary: CI/CD pipeline takes 45 minutes, killing productivity
completed.outcome_text: Found caching opportunities that could cut it to 12 minutes
